module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *12.0.16* FREEPBX-8400 Fix syntax error in dialplan *12.0.15* FREEPBX-6838 Fix queue pause hint syntax for Asterisk 12 *12.0.14* FREEPBX-8318 Play join message first then start music *12.0.13.1* Fix issue on Asterisk 11 *12.0.13* FREEPBX-8216 eventmemberstatus and eventwhencalled removed as of Asterisk 12 *12.0.12* Call Recordings rewrite *12.0.11* Reduce the number of hints/extensions generated for queues. *12.0.10* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.9* ? *12.0.8* Add support for vqplus Callback Queues *12.0.7* Dont initalize these settings anymore *12.0.6* Don't check for devstate anymore, it's always enabled *12.0.5* Add variables to store which queue a call is joining. *12.0.4* FREEPBX-1953 *12.0.3* Add hints for callers in queues. *12.0.2* Forgot one label. *12.0.1* Fix label ordering in a radioset, #7215 -- __construct missing. *12.0.0* FREEPBX-7119 hide depreciated settings and set the to true *2.11.0.15* #7202 MoH not being set properly *2.11.0.14* #6957 *2.11.0.13* Added ::create() call *2.11.0.12* #7011 *2.11.0.11* #6991 *2.11.0.10* #6836, #6881, #6927 *2.11.0.9* #6744 *2.11.0.8* #6703 *2.11.0.7* Added better granularity and range to some Queue time options *2.11.0.6* Fixes #6446, queue recording *2.11.0.5* mis-formed html *2.11.0.4* #6333, adds advanced settings for default starting Queue Event values. *2.11.0.3* add gotodest splicing label *2.11.0.2* remove some dialplan warnings *2.11.0.1* #4767, #6084, #5895, #6092 *2.11.0.0* #6051
